name: Bird Catcher
description:
Try getting all the birds in Bird catcher! A tiny-adventure game about catching birds, while avoiding dogs.

Game created for Mini Jam 99. The theme is birds, which I think this game clearly fulfils. Also, the limitation was that something must always move, and what better to be always moving than the birds you need to catch?

This was the second mini jam game I made and had a really good time making it. Who can have a bad time when making a game with cute dogs and birds :)?
